title: Why the duplicate?

title: nice start

title: Useful

title: Does what it says on the tin

title: Great app
comment: Wonderful. Keep me up to date with all development activities.

title: Can't do anything

title: Laggy
comment: Works well for its intended purpose, but after a few minutes of use, scrolling gets laggy and the line number bar on the left stops updating properly - after a while it slows down to a crawl and becomes unusable until restarted... Wish this would get fixed, fatal flaw for an otherwise well-rounded app...

title: Good
comment: Great to manage issues from phone. But, honesty, UI is awful, would be great to work with it a little more.

title: Really useful

title: Good but not great.
comment: Very useful app but needs 1080p and higher update. Crashes a lot on Note 3. Please enable push notifications when committing.

title: Excellent app

title: Very nice
comment: Branches are kind of buried, and notifications would be amazing.  Otherwise it's the perfect mobile companion for thumbing through a BitBucket repo!

title: Good app.

title: Good app
comment: Does the bare minimum of what I would like. But no complaints other than that. Will most likely contribute to the repo in the future

title: Excellent
comment: Excellent app which exposes all the functionality you could wish for on the go.

title: Decent
comment: I can not change the component or version options when editing an existing issue. That's a drag. Otherwise it's good. But that missing bit frustrates me as I need another app or go to web page to do it. I like the status information for components and versions but it doesn't seem to accurately show how many issues are on a version or component. I'm using bit bucket to modify code for the game star drive for PC.
very well put together! No ads yet looks and feels like an official app (while in fact there isn't one yet)
great app overall, would love having multiple accounts feature

title: Cool
comment: V cool

title: Excellent app, but could be improved
comment: First of all, great app! I use it daily to manage a couple of Repositories. My suggestions for future versions are all related to the issues feature: allow comment when changing issue status; comments and Issue descriptions should have buttons for bold, heading (maybe even a button to insert a link to another issue or a commit, e.g. Pick the commit from list); sometimes the app crashes when editing only the description in an issue.

title: Perfect!
comment: Does everything I want it to do so far!

title: Awesomeness

title: Close
comment: This is surprisingly advanced in some aspects but there are some features that are a little buggy:  Any markdown/Creole hardly ever displays correctly so plain text would be an improvement for now and the UI "visual language" is a bit unclear which might be due to a limited iconset but might be an easy fix for me yo contribute.  Those minor things aside, this is a good implementation of Bitbeaker for when on the go and I commend the efforts of the developer/s.

title: Nice, clean and fast

title: Excellent

title: Fantastic

title: Neat app

title: Really Good

title: Super clean and fast!
comment: Love this app for its simply clean, intuitive interface and lightning speed. Only missing a more robust search...

title: Neat interface.
comment: My only complaint is that I can't specify individual apps for different file formats, e.g., I want to open a PDF file in the source using acrobat or kindle but bitbeaker opens it as ASCII text.

title: Awesome App!
comment: Nice clean interface to browse your repo

title: Does everything I want and does it good
comment: Does everything I want, which is mainly browsing code and creating and browsing issues.  There interface is really great and feels how every modern android application should be.  The issue page is a little boring and does not render bb's markup.
Espectacular

title: Nice but not very useful.
comment: I'll echo others and say that this app needs more comprehensive support for the Issue Tracker. I think that would be the most useful use case.

title: Look great and works great!
comment: I mainly use this app for issue tracking and sometimes looking at code. I previously gave four stars, but with the steady improvements in functionality and appearance I had to come back and give you 5 stars.  Keep up the good work! I love apps that improve my productivity and seeing how quickly this app has improved inspires me to work harder at doing the same.  My only suggestion is to add support to show issue priority and I'm all set.

title: Perfect
comment: Fits my needs perfectly. Well designed. Looks good and follows Holo design guidelines. More apps should take after this one.

title: Nexus 7 / galaxy nexus
comment: Thanks for the refreshed ui. Takes me to login screen though sometimes.

title: Brilliant
